title: Understanding and Practicing Workplace Learning Dimensions: Practice-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Workplace Experience and Understanding of Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Designed for science professionals to understand and implement workplace learning dimensions in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four dimensions of workplace learning (time, space, physicality, objects)
Learners can present at least two examples of practice-based learning approaches in science-related workplace situations
Learners can design learning strategies tailored to their workplace contexts based on mobile-provided case studies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
